summary: Talented software engineer with over thirteen years of experience developing leading edge software, with several years of working in Agile methodologies.  While my language strengths include Java, JavaScript, AngularJS, ReactJS and JSP, I constantly strive to learn new tools and languages that provide me with more options when building solutions and improving my overall development skills. Developed strong skills in design and problem solving with a focus on quality, supportability and maintainability.
